entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches along parts of the coast. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
